Koga Shuko/Punch/Anubis/Hades/Unitron:

::Koga Shuko, Anubis, Hades, and Unitron each got behind relatively large 
boulders::

::All four Preds stood, missile launchers in their hands, four missiles 
launching out at the Alliance base simultaneously::

===============================

::Punch looked straight down the barrel of Zardus' rifle, magnifying the view 
of darkness by 500X::  "My name is Punch." he said, with a kind of out of 
focus look.
